timeline.bodyText:
This method either returns a singleton list or the empty list, right?
If so, I would rather model it like FieldInvariants.isSuperInvariant and return DiagMessage or null.
This makes the code and logic simpler, and the Result to DiagMessage transition more uniform.
timeline.author: wmdietl

replies.bodyText:
Yes, you are right that the method returns a singleton list or the empty list.
Changing its type would make it slightly simpler, but would complicate its caller isValidType, which would need to immediately convert the null or DiagMessage into a list.  Take a look and let me know if you agree.
